description: QA evaluation steps for DR photo verification using VLM AI

steps.criteria: Photo showing cable span from pole to house
Outside view of cable entry point into house
Inside view of cable entry, showing clean installation
Photo of wall where ONT will be/is installed
Back of ONT showing cable connections AND ONT barcode/serial number clearly visible and readable
Clear photo of power meter showing reading
UPS serial number clearly visible and readable
Complete installation showing ONT and cables neatly installed
ONT with green lights indicating successful connection AND DR number label clearly visible on device or nearby
